title: wine_Domäne_Wachau_2012_Kellerberg_Smaragd_Riesling_(Wachau)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 20384.
country: Austria.
description: Breezily aromatic notes of juniper, cypress and lemon zest overlay ripe and juicy peach tones on the nose. The palate is centered on pink grapefruit peel, with a toned, concentrated body that buffers the fresh acidity and delivers a softer style. Everything is tightly held, as in a bud that still needs to open. This is a wine for the long run. Future pleasures are indicated by those multifaceted aromas. Ready from 2016..
designation: Kellerberg Smaragd.
points: 93.
price: 50.0.
province: Wachau.
region_1: .
region_2: .
taster_name: Anne Krebiehl MW.
taster_twitter_handle: @AnneInVino.
title: Domäne Wachau 2012 Kellerberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau).
